<about>

Hi, I am a self-taught Junior Web Developer located in Manchester.

Web Developement is a new career path for me. I have always had passion for art and design and I enjoy solving problems especially when the result can be useful to other users. At the moment I am Front End Developer but my goal for the near future is to improve my skills and learn Back End Developement.
I build modern, responsive websites and apps that have an easy to understand user interface (UX/UI).
As I am starting this new career path I am highly motivated and driven to learn and improve and see any opportunity as an valuable experiance.

What do I do when I'm not working on a project?
I enjoy music, movies and time with friends.
